lyric:
[00:09.560]I'm a new soul I came to this strange world
[00:13.300]hoping I could learn a bit about how to give and take.
[00:18.450]But since I came here
[00:20.530]Felt the joy and the fear
[00:22.910]Finding myself making every possible mistake
[00:28.460]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...
[00:47.689]I'm a young soul in this very strange world hoping
[00:52.899]I could learn a bit about what is true and fake.
[00:57.209]But why all this hate?
[00:59.149]Try to communicate.
[01:01.119]Finding trust and love is not always easy to make.
[01:06.619]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...
[01:47.439]This is a happy end cause' you don't understand
[01:56.990]everything you have done why's everything so wrong
[02:05.859]This is a happy end come and give me your hand I'll take your far away.
[02:15.310]I'm a new soul I came to this strange world hoping
[02:19.670]I could learn a bit about how to give and take
[02:24.150]But since I came here fellt the joy and the fear
[02:28.400]finding myself making every possible mistake
[02:33.850]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...
[02:43.410]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...
tlyric:
[by:Fred_Z]
[00:09.560]我是一个纯净崭新的灵魂，在这光怪陆离的世界初来乍到
[00:13.300]希望我能弄明白如何去索取和给予
[00:18.450]但是自从我来到这里
[00:20.530]尝遍了辛酸苦辣
[00:22.910]发现自己犯了一切可能犯的错误
[00:28.460]
[00:47.689]我是一个年轻蓬勃的灵魂，在这光怪陆离的世界探索
[00:52.899]希望可以弄明白什么是是非黑白
[00:57.209]但为什么世间只是仇恨愤怒？
[00:59.149]还请试着去互相沟通
[01:01.119]我才发现原来信任与爱并不是那么容易就可以学会的
[01:06.619]
[01:47.439]这是一个无暇的结局，因为你尚不能理解
[01:56.990]所有你干过的事，为什么都有那么多的错误？
[02:05.859]这是一个完美的结局，把你的手递给我，我将带你飞离这世界
[02:15.310]我是一个纯净崭新的灵魂，在这光怪陆离的世界初来乍到
[02:19.670]希望我能弄明白如何去索取和给予
[02:24.150]但是自从我来到这里 尝遍了辛酸苦辣
[02:28.400]发现自己犯了一切可能犯的错误
[02:33.850]
[02:43.410]
